title: Patch Notes
content: creatures Wet in addition to creating a Water surface. Freedom of Movement will now correctly preserve against Haunted Approach. Tavern Brawler works with Wild Shapes in Honour Mode again. Tiger's Bloodlust will no longer target items (like the bloody remains of already-dead creatures). Specified more accurately whether Wild-Shaped owlbear, dilophosaurus, and panther attacks are magical or non-magical, depending on the type of druid you are. Fixed a bug causing the upcasted version of Grasping
